{'code': 'from fpdf import FPDF

# Define the content
content = """
ä¸Šæµ·åˆ°ä¸œäº¬æœºç¥¨æ¨è (ä¸œæ–¹èˆªç©º)

1. æœ€ä¾¿æ·é€‰æ‹©ï¼šè™¹æ¡¥ (SHA) -> ç¾½ç”° (HND)
   - èˆªç­å·ï¼šMU537
     æ—¶é—´ï¼šçº¦ 09:40 - 13:30
     ç‰¹ç‚¹ï¼šæ—©å‡ºå‘ï¼Œä¸‹åˆå³å¯åˆ°è¾¾ä¸œäº¬å¸‚åŒºã€‚
   - èˆªç­å·ï¼šMU539
     æ—¶é—´ï¼šçº¦ 14:30 - 18:20
     ç‰¹ç‚¹ï¼šé€‚åˆä¸‹åˆå‡ºå‘çš„æ—…å®¢ã€‚

2. æ€§ä»·æ¯”é€‰æ‹©ï¼šæµ¦ä¸œ (PVG) -> æˆç”° (NRT)
   - èˆªç­å·ï¼šMU523
     æ—¶é—´ï¼šçº¦ 09:10 - 12:50
     ç‰¹ç‚¹ï¼šæµ¦ä¸œæœºåœºæ—©ç­æœºï¼Œåˆ°è¾¾æˆç”°åæœ‰å……è¶³æ—¶é—´å‰å¾€é…’åº—ã€‚
   - èˆªç­å·ï¼šMU271
     æ—¶é—´ï¼šçº¦ 17:10 - 20:55
     ç‰¹ç‚¹ï¼šé€‚åˆä¸‹ç­åæˆ–å¤„ç†å®Œäº‹åŠ¡åå‡ºå‘ã€‚

å»ºè®®ï¼š
- é¦–é€‰ç¾½ç”°ï¼šèŠ‚çœè‡³å°‘ 2 å°æ—¶çš„åœ°é¢äº¤é€šæ—¶é—´ã€‚
- ä»·æ ¼å‚è€ƒï¼šå¾€è¿”å«ç¨ä»·æ ¼é€šå¸¸åœ¨ Â¥2,000 - Â¥3,500 ä¹‹é—´ã€‚
"""

class PDF(FPDF):
    def header(self):
        self.set_font('msyh', 'B', 16)
        self.cell(0, 10, 'æœºç¥¨æ¨èæ–¹æ¡ˆ', ln=True, align='C')
        self.ln(10)

pdf = PDF()
# Add the Microsoft YaHei font
# Note: msyh.ttc usually contains 'Microsoft YaHei'
pdf.add_font('msyh', '', r'C:\Windows\Fonts\msyh.ttc')
pdf.add_font('msyh', 'B', r'C:\Windows\Fonts\msyh.ttc')

pdf.add_page()
pdf.set_font('msyh', '', 12)

for line in content.split('\n'):
    pdf.multi_cell(0, 10, line)

pdf_output_path = "Flight_Recommendations.pdf"
pdf.output(pdf_output_path)
print(f"PDF saved to {pdf_output_path}")
'}

class PDF(FPDF):
    def header(self):
        # We'll set font inside the loop to avoid issues with header initialization
        pass

pdf = FPDF()
pdf.set_auto_page_break(auto=True, margin=15)
pdf.add_page()

# Load font (using the first font in the collection)
pdf.add_font('msyh', '', r'C:\Windows\Fonts\msyh.ttc')
pdf.set_font('msyh', '', 12)

# Title
pdf.set_font('msyh', '', 16)
pdf.cell(0, 15, 'æœºç¥¨æ¨èæ–¹æ¡ˆ', ln=True, align='C')
pdf.ln(5)

# Body
pdf.set_font('msyh', '', 12)
for line in content:
    if line.strip() == "":
        pdf.ln(5)
    else:
        # Using multi_cell with a defined width to avoid the 'no horizontal space' error
        # Effective page width = total width - left margin - right margin
        epw = pdf.w - 2 * pdf.l_margin
        pdf.multi_cell(epw, 8, line)

pdf_output_path = "Flight_Recommendations.pdf"
pdf.output(pdf_output_path)
print(f"PDF saved to {pdf_output_path}")
